plot: A Freeway that may take you anywhere in the world instantaneously. Two children Lili and Bede discover that there is an entrance to the Balanced Particle Freeway which sends them from their school holiday into high adventure.
title: The Balanced Particle Freeway
plot_es: A Freeway that may take you anywhere in the world instantaneously. Two children Lili and Bede discover that there is an entrance to the Balanced Particle Freeway which sends them from their school holiday into high adventure.
plot_en: A Freeway that may take you anywhere in the world instantaneously. Two children Lili and Bede discover that there is an entrance to the Balanced Particle Freeway which sends them from their school holiday into high adventure.
